name: Molly (Yichun He, tomaslei, Tianzuo Peng)
description:
NOTE: Please press the FULLSCREEN button before playing the game! 

Control:

Arrow keys - Move/Aim

Z - Jump

X - Shoot

C - Last bullet Fire 

Hold C or pick up the shell to reload Last Bullet

(Properly use Z, X and C to make jump combo!)

Hi guys! Thank you for viewing this page!!! Here you can play Molly, a metroidvania platformer game made for the Itch Metroidvania Jam. In this game, the character can move around and explore the mysterious town, using his shotgun to defeat strange enemies, and using  input combo to collect chests. 

Hope you enjoy it_(:з」∠)_ And we are looking forward to your advice or comments (owo=)! !!

Team member:

Designer & Programmer: Tianzuo Peng

Designer & Artist: Yichun He

Designer & Writer: Zhe Lei
